name: Butternut Squash Sweet Potato Soup
author: BVDB
summary: Lots of taste and beta carotene!
ingredients: 1  butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
1  sweet potato, peeled and cut into chunks
2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
4 cups chicken stock, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium-high heat
Cook and stir butternut squash, sweet potato, carrot, celery, onion, and garlic in hot butter until lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Pour chicken stock and sweet bell peppers into butternut squash mixture; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until squash and potato are tender, about 40 minutes
Pour squash mixture into a blender no more than half full
Cover and hold lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend
Return pureed soup to pot and season with salt and black pepper
